member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.DefaultInlineConstraintResolver
member.summary: The default implementation of . Resolves constraints by parsing a constraint key and constraint arguments, using a map to resolve the constraint type, and calling an appropriate constructor for the constraint type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.DefaultInlineConstraintResolver.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.RouteOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Accessor for containing the constraints of interest.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.DefaultInlineConstraintResolver.ResolveConstraint(System.String)
member.example: A typical constraint looks like the following "exampleConstraint(arg1, arg2, 12)". Here if the type registered for exampleConstraint has a single constructor with one argument, The entire string "arg1, arg2, 12" will be treated as a single argument. In all other cases arguments are split at comma.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.RouteConstraintBuilder.AddConstraint(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a constraint instance for the given key.
member.param: The key.
The constraint instance. Must either be a string or an instance of .
member.remarks:
If the is a string, it will be converted to a .
For example, the string Product[0-9]+ will be converted to the regular expression ^(Product[0-9]+). See for more details.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.RouteValueEqualityComparer
member.summary: An implementation that compares objects as-if they were route value strings.
member.remarks:
Values that are are not strings are converted to strings using Convert.ToString(x, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture). null values are converted to the empty string.
strings are compared using .

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.Constraints.DateTimeRouteConstraint
member.summary: Constrains a route parameter to represent only values.
member.remarks: This constraint tries to parse strings by using all of the formats returned by the CultureInfo.InvariantCulture.DateTimeFormat.GetAllDateTimePatterns() method. For a sample on how to list all formats which are considered, please visit http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aszyst2c(v=vs.110).aspx

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.Resources.TemplateRoute_InvalidParameterName
member.summary: The route parameter name '{0}' is invalid. Route parameter names must be non-empty and cannot contain these characters: '{{', '}}', '/'. member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.Template.TemplateValuesResult
member.summary: The values used as inputs for constraints and link generation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.Template.TemplateValuesResult.AcceptedValues
member.summary: The set of values that will appear in the URL.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.Template.TemplateValuesResult.CombinedValues
member.summary: The set of values that that were supplied for URL generation.
member.remarks:
This combines implicit (ambient) values from the of the current request (if applicable), explictly provided values, and default values for parameters that appear in the route template.
Implicit (ambient) values which are invalidated due to changes in values lexically earlier in the route template are excluded from this set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetProperties(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the underlying type.
member.param: the instance to extract property accessors for.

member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the specified type.

member.returns: a cached array of all public property getters from the type of target instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetVisibleProperties(System.Object)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The instance to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public property getters from the instance's type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetVisibleProperties(System.Type)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The type to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public property getters from the type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeNullSafeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter which is safe for a null input object. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertySetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property setter for reference types. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the setter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed. This only works for reference types.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.ObjectToDictionary(System.Object)
member.summary:
Given an object, adds each instance property with a public get method as a key and its associated value to a dictionary.
If the object is already an instance, then a copy is returned.
member.remarks: The implementation of PropertyHelper will cache the property accessors per-type. This is faster when the the same type is used multiple times with ObjectToDictionary.
